posts.post_content: Looking to work on a t206 Hal Chase collection. I love the look of the cards so I'm looking for the cards to be in nice shape. Raw is fine as well. Graded, looking from like SGC/PSA 3-6. As well, I am looking for some HOFer's still. Thank you.

Hi!

Let me know if you're interested in either of these:

[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/2909253569/[/url]

[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/4407479524/[/url]

Woopsie -- you said T206s. 

Regards,
Jeff

"Woopsie"?

OK, who are you and what have you done with Jeff?
Jeff's not here.  He's on an endlessly endless search for Cobb cards.
Beautiful cards. Lemme know if you know anyone who has some. Thank you.

If your interested I have:
Chase(White Cap) - PSA4
 
Other HOF cards:
Baker PSA4
Beckley PSA4.5
Bender(No Trees) PSA4
Bresnahan(Port) PSA3
Brown(Port) PSA4
Chance(Yellow) PSA4
Chance(Red) PSA4mk
Clarke( Port) PSA 4
Cobb(Green) PSA4
Cobb(Red)  1xSGC20, 2xSGC30
Lajoie(Throwing) PSA5mk
Marquard(Port) PSA4.5
Mathewson(Dark Cap) SGC20
Mathewson(Port) PSA2
Wallace B.  PSA5mc, PSA5

You can look at scans here.
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/Texxxx[/url]

If you have anything to trade I need would be great but I will sell them also. Send me a PM if your interested and I will get you a price.
Rob, that is a term Jeff has learned out here in the suburbs, its a far cry from NYC...
